segments.text: In this kitchen illustration, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, towel around a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, and water overflows silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle, expression calm and focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the upper cabinet is open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on the two-step stool, hand inside grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans back, legs spread unstably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might tumble any moment, cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit thrilling to see their secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting through the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back let in the daylight nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Despite the risks, there's a charm to this family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
